Quality products right at your fingertips. Discover Kayyali Group across Amman, Jordan.

Kayyali Plastic Industry is dedicated to producing high-quality plastic products for businesses in Jordan and beyond. We combine precision manufacturing with sustainable practices to deliver reliable, innovative solutions that meet the needs of our customers.

Read our story

Our founding

Kayyali Group was established over 40 years ago with a vision to provide high-quality plastic products to businesses in Jordan and beyond. From humble beginnings, we have focused on precision, reliability, and customer satisfaction, laying the foundation for long-term partnerships with local and international clients.

Growth & Beyond

Over the years, Kayyali Group has expanded its production capabilities and embraced modern manufacturing technologies to meet the growing demands of our customers. Our continuous investment in innovation, efficiency, and sustainability ensures that we remain a trusted leader in the plastic products industry, delivering quality solutions today and into the future.

Mohammad Al-Kayyali / CEO, Kayyali Group
